title: Cinematics/Battle Music - Compilation Pack
description: This Pack is a compilation of Cinematic and Battle Music designed for Fantasy, Adventure, Action, Heroes and RPG games.
longDescription:
A compilation of Cinematic and Battle Music designed for Fantasy, Adventure, Action, Heroes and RPG games.


Listen here.


This pack contains 117 files: 15 full tracks, loops, variations and layers;  appropriate for trailers, missions, exploration, deep epic emotions, characters and battles.


All you need for interactive game music.
